appendix.title: IBM &zseries; Installation Instructions
appendix.para: &cloud; supports the &o_comp; ZVMDriver driver which mnages communication between &ostack; and a z/VM hypervisor to deploy and manage &vmguest;s on z/VM. &productname; does not natively support managing and deploying z/VM &vmguest;s—it delegates requests to an &xcat; server running on z/VM. This requires a proper setup on the &zseries; side and a single ∁ node on the &cloud; side.

IBM supports different ways to set up the &zseries; side. This document describes the setup outlined in FIXME—it has been tested by &suse; and is known to work. Additional documentation providing in-depth information to topics also covered in this document are available from IBM and can be retrieved from the IBM Knowledge Center for z/VM 6.3.0:

para.link: z/VM Enabling z/VM for OpenStack (Support for OpenStack Liberty Release)

appendix.para: Note, that these manuals contain procedures and setups not tested by &suse; or not working with &cloud;. Links to sections covering topics described in this manual are provided in the respective sections.

sect1.title: Configuring the &xcat; and ZHCP Servers
sect1.para: Each &xcat; and CMA servers requires a ZHCP server to communiticate with SMAPI. Different setups are supported, however the configuration described in this document is a single z/VM running &xcat; and ZHCP in an integrated CMA (CMA nm). ZHCP is automatically started alongside &xcat; and both services are configured with the DMSSICNF COPY file.

The DMSSICNF COPY file must reside on the MAINT 193 disk only. Adjustments in the DMSSICNF COPY file should only be made locally using the automated local modification procedure. The file must reside on the MAINT 193 disk only. Make sure the server is not running when eiting file.
